title: pixel 3 randomly bootloops for about one hour then recovers
content:
Hi!

Since about 2 weeks now my Pixel 3 started going into random bootloops which last randomly - some last a few minutes, the longest one about 2 hours. Then, all of the sudden, the phone boots normally.

I've only used original Google images.

The bad thing is that I can't even send it to warranty as most probably the bootloop will be over by then.

Any idea if this is a hardware issue or a software one?
